Translations.Text: My utvoryly vas tomu shcho tovaryshi (dlya odyn odnym)
utvorenyy My sleeping takym chynom vy mozhete vidpochyty
My pobuduvaly nad vamy sim vsesvitu
My posylayemo vnyz z khmar llyucha voda
Shchob vyrobyty z tse zerna ta zavody
denʹ rih duyetʹsya, ta vy vkhodyte do natovpu
hory budutʹ usuvatysya, tak, yakby vony buly mirage
Dlya porushnykiv; tse bude yikh abode
Vony zalyshayutʹsya u tse duzhe davno
Vony nikoly ne kushtuyutʹ u tse coolness, ne napiy
Vony nikoly ochikuvani ne buty vlashtovani pidzvitnyy
Zaznayutʹ naslidkiv; my tilʹky zbilʹshymo vash retribution
Vony nikoly ne pochuyutʹ u tse budʹ-yake bez·hluzdya abo brekhnya
vynahoroda z vashoho Lorda; velykodushna vynahoroda
Lord neba ta zemli, ta vse mizh nymy. Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy. Niyakyy kozhnyy ne mozhe skasuvaty Yoho rishennya
denʹ prybude koly Dukh ta anhely lyshatʹsya v syli u ryadi. Nikhto ne budutʹ rozmovlyaty krim tsykh dozvolenoho naybilʹshym Dobrozychlyvyy, ta vony vymovlyatʹ tilʹky shcho virno
Takyy yavlyaye soboyu nemynuchyy denʹ. Whoever wills dozvolyayutʹ yomu berutʹ prytulok u yoho Lordi
My dostatno poperedyly vas pro nemynuchyy retribution. Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ koly kozhnyy vyvchytʹ yaki yoho ruky poslaly vpered, ta disbeliever skazhe, "O, ya bazhayu ya pyl
Ta tsey khto gently berutʹ (dushi viruyuchiv) joyfully
Yak tse vidbulosya pislya my povernulysya u hnyli kistky
Yoho Lord zaklykav yoho u svyashchennyy valley Tuwaa
Rozpovidayutʹ yomu, "Chy ne mohly b vy ne polipshytysya
Dozvolyayete meni keruyete vamy do vashoho Lorda, shcho vy mozhete povernutysya shanoblyvi
Vin todi pokazav yomu velyke chudo
Vin skazav, "ya ye vash Lord; naybilʹsh vysokyy
Otzhe, BOH zdiysnyv yoho do retribution u U maybutnʹomu, tak zhe, yak i u pershomu zhytti
vy bilʹshe tyazhki stvoryuyete nizh nebesa? Vin skonstruyuvav tse
Vin pidnyav yoho masy, ta perfected tse
Vin zrobyv yoho nich temnu, ta brightened yoho morn
Z tse, Vin vyrobyv yoho vlasnu vodu ta pasovyshche
Vse tse zabezpechyty pidtrymku zhyttya dlya vas ta vashykh tvaryn
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ koly lyudsʹkyy z·hadaye vse vin
Yak dlya khto reverenced velychnistʹ yoho Lorda, ta nakazanoho samoho z sinful lusts
Vony prosyatʹ vas pro Hodynu, ta koly yomu budete maty mistse
Tse - ne vy (Muhammad) khto destined oholosyty yoho chas
Vasha misiya musytʹ poperedyty tsi khto ochikuyutʹ tse
denʹ vony bachatʹ tse, vony budutʹ vidchuvaty tak, yakby vony vytrymaly odyn vechir abo polovyna denʹ
